title: Toast POS API Compatibility
description:
Implement Toast POS API compatibility layer for workers.do platform. Toast is a leading restaurant POS and management platform ($13B).

## API Categories
- **Authentication** - OAuth 2.0 token-based auth
- **Orders** - Create, modify, close orders (GET/POST/PATCH)  
- **Menus** - Items, modifiers, groups (V2/V3)
- **Labor** - Employees, jobs, time entries, schedules
- **Payments** - Credit cards, tenders, tips
- **Configuration** - Restaurant setup, revenue centers
- **Stock** - Inventory management
- **Cash Management** - Drawer events, deposits
- **Analytics** - Reporting, sales data
- **Webhooks** - Outbound APIs for events

## Documentation
- Developer Guide: https://doc.toasttab.com/doc/devguide/
- API Reference: https://doc.toasttab.com/openapi/
- Orders API: https://doc.toasttab.com/doc/devguide/portalOrdersApiOverview.html
- Labor API: https://toastintegrations.redoc.ly/openapi/labor/overview/
- Menus API: https://doc.toasttab.com/doc/devguide/apiGettingMenuInformationFromTheMenusAPI.html

title: [RED] Labor API endpoint tests
description:
Write failing tests for Toast Labor API.

## Endpoints to Test
- GET /labor/v1/employees - List employees
- POST /labor/v1/employees - Create employee
- PUT /labor/v1/employees/{employeeId} - Update employee
- DELETE /labor/v1/employees/{employeeId} - Delete employee
- GET /labor/v1/jobs - Get job types
- GET /labor/v1/timeEntries - Get time entries

## Test Cases
1. CRUD operations for employees
2. Employee email uniqueness validation
3. Passcode validation (1-8 numeric chars)
4. Job assignment and wage overrides
5. Time entries with clock in/out
6. regularHours and overtimeHours calculation
7. businessDate and closeoutHour handling
8. externalEmployeeId mapping

## Reference
https://doc.toasttab.com/doc/cookbook/apiIntegrationChecklistEmployee.html
https://doc.toasttab.com/doc/cookbook/apiIntegrationChecklistPayroll.html
